website_summaries.verdict: This highly collectible set includes 4 unique mini figures and plenty of accessories, and it’s easy to build.
pros: Collectors love the Reverse Flash and Killer Frost mini figures included in this set
CyborgCopter’s guns can be carried by Cyborg figure
A good transitional build for kids moving up from LEGO Juniors, with 271 pieces
cons: Helicopter’s net doesn’t latch well or shoot well

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Flash is one of my daughter's favorites and after watching the Lego movie he HAD to have some - this set came to the rescue because it had Flash and Reverse Flash. Also Cyborg which he loved. He doesn't like putting Lego helicopters together but we still had fun. He enjoys the car and Killer Frost enough.Just right for building with a little help, and then lots of play time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Campos

customer_reviews.title: Geat Lego set allowing lots of imagination.
customer_reviews.text: Our 5-year old grandson was thrilled to get this for Christmas. He began putting it together that day and has spent many happy hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set With The Flash!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old LOVED this!! He is a HUGE fan of The Flash, so he was thrilled this set came with multiple Flash figures. We put it together immediately and he plays with it all the time. Its been a couple of months since we purchased it, and it's still all put together! LOVE LEGOS!!
customer_reviews.author: KCKitty816

customer_reviews.title: Let go of my lego
customer_reviews.text: My six years old son just loves playing with this. We both love the flash character and will probably be buying the other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Waynetango

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy with it
customer_reviews.text: 8 yo son was happy with the set. We put assembled together but he really did most of it on his own with instructions. Price is same or cheaper than other brick and mortar stores. Pretty fair price for LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? It’s a Lego set. Better than puzzles for your child’s mental development.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I collect minifigures and was really happy to add reverse flash and cyborg to the collection! The set took 2-3 hours to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Legos are great for kids imaginations
customer_reviews.text: Lego's are great. Fantastic value plus. 1 click and it comes to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Erlinger

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present.  It was just as described.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present. He seemed very happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it for his 10 th birthday, just what he wanted, I had it within 24 hours of purchase.

customer_reviews.text: I loved the toy i really did but it is too much for that other than that the toy is the best thing that ever happened to me its just over priced

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old grandson loved this set! It's his favorite and he has a lot of legos.

customer_reviews.text: Characters were in great shape I loved the reverse flash and the new flash design there is a movie coming out about this I can’t wait. Ps the new flash design has the speed force lighting pattern

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great set, for a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I am overall pleased with this one. There are some minor things that could be done better by LEGO (i.e. the helecopter seating/door/sticker; and adding some 1x1 snow/ice blocks for the car) But overall this is a great set. I mean you get an attack helicopter!! Lots of play value here.
customer_reviews.author: N.W. HEMP

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Is a cool product & I used it for me
customer_reviews.author: Henry Pineda

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes Speed Force Freeze Pursuit 76098 Building Kit (271 Piece)
product_meta.description: Dash with The Flash to catch Reverse Flash and match the awesome CyborgCopter against Killer Frost’s Ice Car, with this LEGO DC Super Heroes 76098 Speed Force Freeze Pursuit set. The CyborgCopter has a net shooter and detachable weapons that double as minifigure weapons, while the Ice Car features an adjustable bulldozer blade and 2 stud shooters. This superhero toy for kids includes the buildable blue Energy Infuser, 4 minifigures and assorted translucent-ice-blue Power Burst elements to customize your builds and minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build the CyborgCopter, featuring a net shooter, dual stud shooter and radar, and Killer Frost’s Ice Car with an adjustable bulldozer blade and dual stud shooters
Includes The Flash figure with Power Blast weapons, Reverse Flash figure, Cyborg figure and Killer Frost figure
CyborgCopter measures over 3” (8cm) high, 10” (26cm) long and 4” (12cm) wide Killer Frost’s Ice Car measures over 2” (7cm) high, 5” (15cm) long and 1” (5cm) wide
271 pieces – DC collectible helicopter toy for boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars182 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
